sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtncpyrhtinfo ( CPYRHT_ID /* */ , CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #cpyrhtId# /* */ , #cpyrhtPrtcPolicyCn# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtncpyrhtinfo SET CPYRHT_ID=#cpyrhtId# /* */ , CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN=#cpyrhtPrtcPolicyCn# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE CPYRHT_ID=#cpyrhtId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CPYRHT_ID /* */ , CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtncpyrhtinfo WHERE CPYRHT_ID=#cpyrhtId# /* */

SELECT CPYRHT_ID /* */ , CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtncpyrhtinfo WHERE 1=1
CPYRHT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CPYRHT_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtncpyrhtinfo WHERE 1=1
CPYRHT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
